caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. THEODORE BROWN, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: No. 497 EAL 2005, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2006, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
